title: Flash Card Deck
description: Schema for cards.json files in a flash card data repository. Each key is the raw term being learned (TTS-readable).

front.description: Markdown content for the front side. Defaults to the key (term) if omitted.

back.description: Markdown content for the back side.

created.description: ISO 8601 date when the card was created.

reversible.description: Whether the card can be studied in reverse (backâ†’front).

state.description: FSRS scheduling state for the forward direction (managed by the app).

reverseState.description: FSRS scheduling state for the reverse direction (managed by the app).

suspended.description: Whether the card is suspended from review.
